subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: After the Kings’ Game 5 loss to the Devils in the Stanley Cup finals, team captain Dustin Brown said that “it’s been a long, long playoffs.” The Kings have no choice but to play through it.
snippet: After the Kings’ Game 5 loss to the Devils in the Stanley Cup finals, team captain Dustin Brown said that “it’s been a long, long playoffs.” The Kings have no choice but to play through it.
